name: Extreme Mision - Agent X
description:
Extreme Mission is a platformer and action videogame. The objective is to deactivate a powerful bomb. To do this, you will find five keys that are scattered throughout the levels. You have 10 minutes of time to do it. There are 5 levels in total called "Zones." They are connected by portals. You must find the connections to the zones and the path that allows them to collect all the keys and find and deactivate the bomb.

This video game uses its own 2D game engine. The game allows you to add more levels and change the images of the current elements.

NOTE:
This videogame require Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 redistributable.
Run this file: vcredist_x86.exe (including in the zip)  Or download from Microsoft web site.

SHA256:ee68e661eaa0a018d1c4967806fe12da7fb62a1f5ffee55a385f24c875e1fec7
